task.title: Relocate View
task.shortdesc: Move a view to a new position within the Session Editor.

step.cmd: Click on the view's title bar and drag it to the desired location within the Session Editor window.
step.stepresult: As you drag the view, the Session Editor will show the alternate position of that view. When it appears as you wish, release the mouse button.

step.cmd: Two or more views may occupy the same location in the Session Editor. To do so, drag and drop one view to the title bar of the other view.
step.stepresult: You can switch between views in the same position by selecting the appropriate tab at the bottom of either view.
